OOC: Yeah, they were flying to the crash site of the mining base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  Nightlight/Trinity/WindlordTermitron/Quetzalcoatl::
> "Ok, "replied Windlord while he was ready to a strike back. 
Termitron took Trinity who continued sobbing  and when she saw 
Nightlight and Aerotaur she said "Where will go??? have the bad-guys 
gone, uncle Aerotaur?"
> Quetzalcoatl received the comm link and said to Starstomp "We must 
come back"
> OOC: I guess that they are outside, I forgot where they are
>   Rudra656@a... wrote: ::Aerotaur::
>       He glared at the monitor and shakes his head.  He opens a com 
channel to Windlord, Termitron, and the other original Chivtrons along 
with the Taurusoids.  "We're leaving now.  We're going to fly out of 
here.  It's no longer safe.  We're outnumbered and vastly outgunned.  
When we leave I'm taking the Taurusoids to find Chaostaur.  Someone 
must contact me with the location of our new base."
